original_text: Jesus continued to walk along the shore. Soon he saw two more men who were brothers. They were called James and John. They were the sons of Zebedee. They were in their boat and they were mending their nets.
korean_text: 조금 더 가시다가 세베대의 아들 야고보와 그 형제 요한을 보시니 그들도 배에 있어 그물을 깁는데

sentences.original_text: Jesus continued to walk along the shore.
Soon he saw two more men
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 그는 두 명의 다른 사람을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: They were called James and John.
They were the sons of Zebedee.
and they were mending their nets.
